First Person Shooter

First Person Shooter

Description:

This is a short FPS game that was made using Unity's "FPS Microgame" tutorial. Game assets and code by Unity. Level design by Francis McKee.

Controls:

Desktop/ PC Controls: Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Spacebar to jump.


Download and play!

This website was created by Francis McKee in 2022-2023 by utilizing Github Pages, and was programmed fully in CSS, HTML, and Javascript. SiteMap
